AD_Sign_SingingLute_01_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Sign_SingingLute_01_0.text: *Kitchen closed during the day. Come back for dinner.*

AD_Sign_SingingLute_05_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Sign_SingingLute_05_0.text: *LIVE MUSIC at The Singing Lute. They sing for their supper while you eat yours!*

AD_Sign_SingingLute_04_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Sign_SingingLute_04_0.text: *Join us at the famous Singing Lute basement bar. Good ale for good coin. All welcome.*

AD_Sign_SingingLute_03_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Sign_SingingLute_03_0.text: *Drink up at The Singing Lute! Local brews and specialty imports available.*

AD_Sign_SingingLute_02_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_Sign_SingingLute_02_0.text: *Reservations open for dinner tonight. 'For a meal that will warm your Baldurian soul' - The Singing Lute. *
